description: Try our easy to follow Easter Chocolate Mousse Cheesecake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easter Chocolate Mousse Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons gelatine dissolved in 1/4 cup boiling water

recipeInstructions.text: Decorate the cheesecake with chocolate noodle nests filled with chocolate mini eggs
